scripts.aab: npm run env_prod && cd ./android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && open ./app/build/outputs/bundle/release && cd ../
scripts.codepush:dev: npm run codepush:android:dev & npm run codepush:ios:dev
scripts.codepush:prod: npm run codepush:android:prod & npm run codepush:ios:prod
scripts.codepush:android:dev: npm run env_dev && appcenter codepush release-react -a Solid-State-Group/DiagnosisView-Android -d Staging -m
scripts.codepush:android:prod: npm run env_prod && appcenter codepush release-react -a Solid-State-Group/DiagnosisView-Android -d Production -m
scripts.codepush:ios:dev: npm run env_dev && appcenter codepush release-react -a Solid-State-Group/DiagnosisView-iOS -d Staging -m
scripts.codepush:ios:prod: npm run env_prod && appcenter codepush release-react -a Solid-State-Group/DiagnosisView-iOS -d Production -m
scripts.andClean: cd ./android & sh ./gradlew clean && react-native run android
scripts.apk:dev: npm run env_dev && cd ./android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && open ./app/build/outputs/apk/release && cd ../
scripts.apk:prod: npm run env_prod && cd ./android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && open ./app/build/outputs/apk/release && cd ../
scripts.keystoreDevelop: keytool -exportcert -alias androiddebugkey -keystore ~/.android/debug.keystore | openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64
scripts.keystoreProd: keytool -exportcert -alias android -keystore ./android/keystores/prod.keystore | openssl sha1 -binary | openssl base64
